credit_line: Bequest of Mrs. Horace W. Frost
title: Saindhavi Ragini, Page from a Dispersed Ragamala Set
medium: opaque watercolor on paper, heightened with gold
description: from same Ragamala Set as 83.26.3 and 91.15.8
inscriptions: u.c. in black ink: [calligraphic inscription "Of Bhairava, the 5th Ragini, Sindhi"]; verso u.l. in pencil: [marks obstructed by hinge]; verso u.c. in pencil: photographer 6/8/64/ N No. 10567; verso center in pencil: Bhairair; verso l.r. in pencil: 3/64/ aroo
